subject: Hockey, Ice
Basketball
Coaches and Managers
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Boe’s simultaneous stewardship of two New York area sports franchises, the Nets and the Islanders, brought championships, controversy and financial struggles.
